Job Description – Senior Backend Engineer
Northwind Logistics – Hamburg

Responsibilities
- Build scalable APIs for parcel routing and real-time tracking.
- Improve reliability and monitoring for our Go services.
- Partner with product to design roadmap experiments.

Requirements
- Strong experience with Go or Python and cloud-native stacks.
- Background in event-driven architectures and message queues.
- Ability to mentor engineers and collaborate with operations teams.

Compensation & perks
- Salary range €80,000–€95,000 plus equity and on-call allowance.
- Remote-friendly within Germany with quarterly team weeks.
- Equipment budget and private health add-ons.

Process
- Intro call, technical pairing session, architecture interview, founder chat.

Team
We are a small platform engineering group embedded in our parcel operations tribe.
